name: Miner Trouble
description:
Miner Trouble. 
Made by 88CrazyFish as final game in Advanced Game Design class in Reykjavik University.

2 miners stuck on a level. They must search for the key to open the door up top.

The game is a competitive mining game where players try to get as much money as possible and escape the lava at the end.

The game requires 2 x-box controllers or any 2 joysticks that work on PC.

Use left joystick to move around.

A-jump

B-rocketboots

Right trigger-Axe

Y-upgrade menu

In upgrade menu: X-upgrade Axe, Y-upgrade Rocketboots

keyboard-R to restart the game

keyboard-esc to quit the game
